task.title: How to Adjust the Swivel Chairs

context.p: The swivel chairs in Shanks Hall are wonderful for comfort and space, but they often have to be adjusted since so many people use them on a daily basis. This task will cover how to adjust the swivel chairs.

step.cmd: Locate the lever underneath of the seat.
Push the lever up to raise the chair's height. To lower the chair's height, push the lever down.

info.note: Do this slowly. Adjust the height by centimeters or inches at a time.

step.cmd: Let go of the lever once it is at your desired height.
